alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 3:40PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Western Hampshire MA, Northern Worcester MA, Eastern Franklin MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along with a flash freeze as temperatures drop into the 20s. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and sleet between midnight and 6 am Friday. The morning commute will be impacted along with a flash freeze expected as temperatures drop into the 20s.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
